name: PAIRBOT
description:
"A long time ago, evil force landed on the face of the earth, and mankind was forced to escape into bunkers. The survivors built many different kinds of robots to protect themselves. One of the models named "PAIRBOTS" were made to counter the evil force. Unfortunately, the plan didn't work out. And so mankind decided to forbid anyone from exiting the bunkers."

GAMEPLAY

In the game, you control a PAIRBOT, who wants to exit the bunkers to find and destroy the evil force. PAIRBOT consists of two different bots that you control separately.  Smash your way through Anti-PAIRBOT-Drones and escape the bunkers!

NOTES

This game was a submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. Due to the time constraints I had during the jam, I didn't have enough time to create music for the game. I hope you can still enjoy the experience nonetheless.
